title: BUGALUGS Artificial Grass Cleaner - Dog Safe, Pet Disinfectant & Lawn Deodoriser - Puppy Urine Cleaner & Odour Eliminator - 1L Super Concentrate - Made in UK Cruelty Free (Fresh Cut Grass 1L)
features: Artificial Grass & Patio Cleaner is a powerful 3-in-1 disinfectant, deodoriser and cleaner that gives you instant results, removing harmful bacteria, deep stains and neutralising odours specific to your pet’s little surprises while being pet friendly

With it’s fresh cut grass fragrance and disinfecting qualities, Bugalugs Artificial Grass & Patio Cleaner is incredibly easy to use and great value for money. Each 1L concentrated bottle makes up to a staggering 10L of solution for soiled areas, all you have to do is add water

Unlike other products that can take weeks to work, our fast-acting solution dries in just 15 minutes! Simply apply the product evenly using a watering can and work it into your artificial grass using a stiff brush. Rinse away with cold water

No need to purchase a wealth of different cleaning products anymore; Bugalugs can be used as kennel disinfectant and deodoriser and suitable for a wide range of surfaces, such as patios, kennels, astroturf and tennis courts to help keep your spaces clean and odour-free

Bugalugs are the superior choice in natural solutions and are committed to producing products that meet your pets needs. With its ability to dry quickly, your pets and children can be back out in the garden playing in the fresh air in no time at all
description: Product description Looking for an easy to use, fast-acting lawn cleaner that’s safe for your dogs and family? Bugalugs 3-in-1 Artificial Grass & Patio Cleaner, Disinfectant and Deodoriser is a dog-friendly solution designed to keep your outdoor spaces clean and odour-free. With its fresh fragrance, Bugalugs Artificial Grass & Patio Cleaner is perfect for working on those deep stains and removing harmful bacteria that comes from your pet’s little surprises. Each bottle contains 1L of concentrated solution, giving you a whopping 10L per bottle. This product can also be used on patios, kennels, astroturf and tennis courts - no need to spend out on lots of different cleaning products anymore! Directions To apply, simply dilute the Artificial Grass Cleaner - 10 parts water to 1 part concentrate. Apply through a watering can or manual pump spray. Work solution in using hard brush and leave for 15-20 minutes. Rinse away with water. 1L of concentrate is suitable for covering up to 100m2. Ensure garden watering can is thoroughly cleaned after application to avoid traces of the product being left in the container.
